title: Strategies for Enhancing Mathematical Thinking and Social Interaction via Online Forums

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Knowledge and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Blended Classroom Combining Online Forum Experiments and Offline Discussions in a BYOD Environment, Measuring Learning Outcomes Through Project-Based Assessment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze changes in cognitive presence based on instructor feedback types in online forums
Learners can propose 3+ specific strategies to strengthen social presence during mathematical problem-solving processes
Learners can write reports evaluating learning effects (when teaching, cognitive, and social presences interact) with 80%+ accuracy
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
